alert.note: Alert for Tooele and Rush Valleys; Utah Valley (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 3:43PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Juab... west central Utah and southeastern Tooele Counties through 415 PM MDT... At 342 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles west of Elberta, or 23 miles west of Payson, moving north at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Eureka. This includes US Route 6 between mile markers 138 and 143. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Tooele and Rush Valleys; Utah Valley
